channel.title: Math.ceil, floor, and trunc Examples :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Math.ceil The general syntax for this method is: Math.ceil(number) This method rounds a decimal value UP to the next integer (hence the ceiling reference in the name). Integer values remain the same. ceil also operates on arrays. Numerical strings can also be evaluated, but should be avoided as a best practice. Example 1 2 3 4 5 6 7
